content:
Hello , Could you please help me to find the real cause of not executing Crucible Test execution at endpoint
It gives me an error "Error: Server conformance could not be loaded" but if I ht the same request from browser then it returns the result as conformance file gets downloaded. Please suggest the solution
Can you clarify "not executing Crucible Test execution at endpoint"?

While I selecting resource like Adverse Event from Clicnical section and execute the test then it give me error "Error: Server conformance could not be loaded" but if I ht the same request "http://ohc-dem-1-fhir-1.centralindia.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/org1" from browser then it returns the result as conformance file gets downloaded

@Abhishek I can't access any CapabilityStatement (or Conformance if an earlier version of FHIR) at that endpoint, so I doubt Crucible will be able to either. Doing a GET to http://ohc-dem-1-fhir-1.centralindia.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/org1/metadata returns:

{"resourceType": "OperationOutcome","id":"400","issue": [{"severity":"error","code":"invalid","details":{"text":"Submitted request is malformed / invalid."}}]}

Until the FHIR service returns a properly formatted CapabilityStatement it cannot do anything.
